entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -8.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
